JobFullDesc: The Facebook Employer Brand team builds meaningful connections between job candidates and the Facebook brand. As a global team, our goal is to build brand loyalty and develop a community of people who view Facebook as an employer of choice. Through strategic, thoughtful, and innovative creative work shared across employer brand channels, we help people discover, understand, and make connections with Facebook's mission, culture, and values. Facebook’s Employer Brand Team is seeking an Employer Brand Manager, North America to create and execute brand marketing initiatives around Facebook as an employer. In this role, you'll create content that spotlights our people, culture, and values. You will be responsible for leading strategic development, creation, execution, and measurement of brand initiatives and building our employer brand in the eyes of our North America talent markets. You'll work with various stakeholders including Recruiting, Creative, Brand Strategy, Events, Communications, Consumer Marketing, and more.The ideal individual for this role will consider themselves a storyteller and creative generalist; someone who not only has inspiring brand ideas but who can execute and bring them to life. They should be skilled content creators, have excellent interviewing and editing abilities, understand how to build and lead measurement plans, thrive managing multiple projects concurrently, and will succeed in a fast-moving organization. They’ll value the importance of discovering and telling people-driven stories, building trusted interpersonal relationships, and ensuring diversity is at the heart of everything they do. They’re curious about understanding audience insights and distilling brand challenges. They’re stewards of brand integrity with a logical outlook for project execution. They thrive within cross-functional teams and exhibit excellent organizational skills. They are well-versed in brand marketing, high-performing content, and social optimization.
